content.rendered:
Scheduled Residence

Significance ♦ Aim & Purpose ♦ Principles & Guiding Lights ♦ Ashram’s Rules and Regulations ♦ Guru’s Philosophy & Teachings ♦ Guru’s Divine Guidance ♦ Tradition of Guru ♦ Dedicated Activities of Gurus, Saints and Sadhakas

Significance

Ashram gives a significant meaning of Gopinath. The main significance of Gopinath Bhakti Ashram is that it gives a significant meaning of Gopinath, which is Love of Gopis to Lord Krishna.

Aim & Purpose

Ashram most focused areas to make a bright and solid future

Coming soon….

Principles & Guiding Lights

Vedantic tradition, Hindu sacred texts and guruparampara

Coming soon….

Ashram’s Rules and Regulations

(Practice of discipline necessary for self-transformation)

The perfect way to treat seekers, visitors and guests

Coming soon….

Guru’s Philosophy & Teachings

The learning subjects explained by Pujya Guruji.

Guru’s Divine Guidance

The divine guidance of Pujya Guruji.

Tradition of Guru

Ashram’s main tradition built by Pujya Guruji.

Dedicated Activities of Gurus, Saints and Sadhakas

Dedicated Activities of Gurus and Saints

(Specific areas of activity where Gurus and Saints spend their time)

Pujya Guruji, God-realized Gurus and Saints

More coming soon….

Dedicated Activities of Sadhakas

Sadahkas Responsibilities and Code of Conduct

(For all Sadhakas living permanently in the Ashram)

Instructed only by Pujya Guruji to follow thoroughly

Guru Sishya Parampara

(An establishment of a specific parampara or sampradaya)

The relationship between Pujya guruji and all Sadhakas of GEOKC
